label: Taxon Concept Label
definition: A name given to the resource.
notes: In TCS `dcterms:title` is used for the taxonomic concept label [\[senderov_openbiodiv-o_2018\]](../bibliography#senderov_openbiodiv-o_2018), which consists of the Taxon Name and a reference to the publication where the concept is circumscribed, separated by 'sec.', which stands for 'secundus' ('according to'). It is used to indicate one specific meaning of a name – a Taxon Concept – rather than the cumulative nomenclatural and taxonomic legacy associated with the name.
